comments: Pre-registered for this game and it didn't disappoint. Graphics are smooth, characters are great with fluid combat system. My only bad point with it is that after a few days of playing I went to open up the game and it won't load, I get as far as the n way screen then black screen?? Please fix Devs, anxious to delve back into it.

OMG ITS FINALLY OUT! I've been waiting for this to come out for like literally 4 years! Anyway so far I honestly liked the equipment system in the original version better than this one.. I don't like the whole idea of unlocking equipment you got, that just doesn't even make a lot of sense.. Plus there is an equipment list that kinda shows you what everything looks like right now so thats a bit of a spoiler for me for obtaining new gear.. Other than that, the gameplay is great! You get all 4 characters much more immediately and I do like that. 4 stars at this point but I can see myself coming back and bumping it up to 5!

So far so good.. pretty smooth but i guess the graphic got downgraded because i remember this game had better graphic quaLity before.. maybe add graphic quaLity option? aLso the targeting system is a bit too hard.. maybe add an option to assist targeting because it's hard to aim i kept getting missed hits.. overaLL its decent.. keep it up!

The game runs decent although you do need wifi or a very good connection for arena. Everything is very limited due to the awful energy/stamina system which will obviously be a huge downfall. It gets repetitive fairly quick and is limited on what you can actually do. Looks like it will be heavily P2W with all the store sales and again, running out of energy quickly. It's a good game for an hour here or there but for a game that you need to farm items for equipment the energy limit really ruins it. I'll be looking elsewhere for a similar game without the energy/stamina limitations

Fun game, but it pisses me off that games with this potential are ran by greedy companies. This game is littered with P2W aspects and locked behind energy and time walls. It's like corrupting something awesome and makes me sick, I won't be giving this much attention because of it.

Brother who read my comment I don't care who is who read my comments. I think this game is good but not best. Graphics is very good. Addictive every thing is fine but energy which need to start adventurous stages is too costly and take lots of time to recover, this too wrong.also one thing try to increase chacters as possible. Is you are normal reder like my comment and is you are from nway so comenet on my comment and try to improve game.
description: Put your fighting skills to the test. ChronoBlade is the only side-scrolling RPG brawler featuring explosive arcade-style combat, and real-time synchronous PvP action.Explosive Skill-Based CombatEach character has over 30 punishing ground and air attacks for you to chain together for insane combos. Master the controls to dodge, block and counter attacks. Dominate in Real-Time Synchronous BattlesCrush your competition in synchronous PvP battles. Your skill and timing are key in this competitive action game.Your Character. Your Style.Play as any of the four main characters throughout the game. Outfit your hero with custom equipment for strategic upgrades. An open-ended progression system lets you build the ultimate character personalized to your play style.
descriptionHTML:
Put your fighting skills to the test. ChronoBlade is the only side-scrolling RPG brawler featuring explosive arcade-style combat, and real-time synchronous PvP action.

Explosive Skill-Based Combat
Each character has over 30 punishing ground and air attacks for you to chain together for insane combos. Master the controls to dodge, block and counter attacks.

Dominate in Real-Time Synchronous Battles
Crush your competition in synchronous PvP battles. Your skill and timing are key in this competitive action game.

Your Character. Your Style.
Play as any of the four main characters throughout the game. Outfit your hero with custom equipment for strategic upgrades. An open-ended progression system lets you build the ultimate character personalized to your play style.
developerAddress:
564 Market St. Suite 550
San Francisco, CA 94104
summary: Side-scrolling RPG brawler with arcade-style combat & real-time synchronous PvP
title: ChronoBlade

description: This game is perfect for learning all the countries' capitals or for testing you knowledge: -	Several game modes are available: world quiz, quiz by contient... -	And a challenge for those who like competition! -      You can review and learn the countries' capitals using the list mode. -	It contains the capitals of the 199 countries. -	It is user friendly.When playing quiz, the point of the game is to get as many correct answers as possible, with 3 wrong answers allowed.When playing challenge, you have a limited time to guess a maximum capitals possible.Will you succeed to reach the best score?
descriptionHTML:
This game is perfect for learning all the countries' capitals or for testing you knowledge:
- Several game modes are available: world quiz, quiz by contient...
- And a challenge for those who like competition!
- You can review and learn the countries' capitals using the list mode.
- It contains the capitals of the 199 countries.
- It is user friendly.

When playing quiz, the point of the game is to get as many correct answers as possible, with 3 wrong answers allowed.
When playing challenge, you have a limited time to guess a maximum capitals possible.

Will you succeed to reach the best score?
summary: Quiz of the countries' capitals of the world
title: Capitals of the countries - Quiz
